kanto_pokedex.name: Poliwhirl
kanto_pokedex.description: The spiral on its belly is its organs showing through its thin skin. It is better at swimming than walking.
kanto_pokedex.evolution: Evolves into Poliwrath with a Water Stone or Politoed via trade while holding a King's Rock.

kanto_pokedex.name: Poliwrath
kanto_pokedex.description: With its extremely tough muscles, it can keep swimming indefinitely. It can even swim across the ocean.

kanto_pokedex.name: Abra
kanto_pokedex.description: It sleeps for 18 hours a day. It uses a variety of extrasensory powers even while asleep.

kanto_pokedex.name: Kadabra
kanto_pokedex.description: It is said that a boy with psychic abilities transformed into Kadabra while he was assisting research into extrasensory powers.

kanto_pokedex.name: Alakazam
kanto_pokedex.description: Its brain cells multiply continually until it dies. As a result, it remembers everything.

kanto_pokedex.name: Machop
kanto_pokedex.description: It loves to work out and build its muscles. It is never satisfied, even if it has trained all day.

kanto_pokedex.name: Machoke
kanto_pokedex.description: It happily helps people with tough jobs. It is so strong, it can easily hold a sumo wrestler on its arms.

kanto_pokedex.name: Machamp
kanto_pokedex.description: It can deliver a flurry of punches in an instant. With four arms, it can attack and defend simultaneously.

kanto_pokedex.name: Bellsprout
kanto_pokedex.description: It plants its feet deep in the ground to replenish water. It can't escape its foes while its feet are planted.

kanto_pokedex.name: Weepinbell
kanto_pokedex.description: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is melted inside by strong acid.
kanto_pokedex.evolution: Evolves into Victreebel with a Leaf Stone.

kanto_pokedex.name: Victreebel
kanto_pokedex.description: It lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is melted in a day, bones and all.

kanto_pokedex.name: Tentacool
kanto_pokedex.description: Because its body is almost entirely composed of water, it shrivels up if it is washed ashore.

kanto_pokedex.name: Tentacruel
kanto_pokedex.description: It has 80 tentacles that move about freely. They can sting, causing poisoning and sharp, stabbing pain.

kanto_pokedex.name: Geodude
kanto_pokedex.description: It is found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

kanto_pokedex.name: Graveler
kanto_pokedex.description: It rolls on steep mountainous trails. Its speed gets so high, it can't be stopped by a boulder.

kanto_pokedex.name: Golem
kanto_pokedex.description: It is enclosed in a boulder-like shell. It is said that this Pokémon will shed its skin once a year.

kanto_pokedex.name: Ponyta
kanto_pokedex.description: Its hooves are ten times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.

kanto_pokedex.name: Rapidash
kanto_pokedex.description: At full gallop, its blazing mane sparkles, enhancing its beautiful appearance.

kanto_pokedex.name: Slowpoke
kanto_pokedex.description: It is always vacantly lost in thought, but no one knows what it is thinking about. It is good at fishing with its tail.
kanto_pokedex.evolution: Evolves into Slowbro or Slowking via trade while holding a King's Rock.

kanto_pokedex.name: Slowbro
kanto_pokedex.description: A Shellder bite set off a chemical reaction with the spices in Slowpoke's tail, creating a new Pokémon.

kanto_pokedex.name: Magnemite
kanto_pokedex.description: The units at its sides generate electromagnetic waves that keep it airborne. It loses its magnetism if it runs out of electricity.

kanto_pokedex.name: Magneton
kanto_pokedex.description: A linked cluster of three Magnemite. It discharges powerful magnetic waves at high voltage.
kanto_pokedex.evolution: Evolves into Magnezone in a special magnetic field.

kanto_pokedex.name: Farfetch'd
kanto_pokedex.description: It can't live without the stalk it holds. That is why it defends the stalk from attackers with its life.

kanto_pokedex.name: Doduo
kanto_pokedex.description: The two heads have separate brains. A scientific study revealed that the two heads may be telepathic.

kanto_pokedex.name: Dodrio
kanto_pokedex.description: An odd species that is rarely found. The three heads respectively represent joy, sadness, and anger.

kanto_pokedex.name: Seel
kanto_pokedex.description: The horn on its head is sharp. It is used to bore holes in ice floes to sleep under the water.

kanto_pokedex.name: Dewgong
kanto_pokedex.description: It loves to snooze on bitterly cold ice. The colder it gets, the better it feels.

kanto_pokedex.name: Grimer
kanto_pokedex.description: It was born when sludge in a dirty stream was exposed to the moon's X-rays. It appears in filthy areas.

kanto_pokedex.name: Muk
kanto_pokedex.description: A toxic fluid seeps from its body. The fluid instantly kills plants and trees on contact.

kanto_pokedex.name: Shellder
kanto_pokedex.description: It swims backward by opening and closing its two shells. Its large tongue is always kept hanging out.
kanto_pokedex.evolution: Evolves into Cloyster with a Water Stone.

kanto_pokedex.name: Cloyster
kanto_pokedex.description: Its shell is so hard, it can even withstand a bomb. No one has ever seen what is inside.

kanto_pokedex.name: Gastly
kanto_pokedex.description: A being that exists as a thin gas. It can topple an Indian elephant by enveloping the prey in two seconds.

kanto_pokedex.name: Haunter
kanto_pokedex.description: It can pass through any wall. It stalks its prey and licks them with its gaseous tongue to steal their life force.

kanto_pokedex.name: Gengar
kanto_pokedex.description: It is said to emerge from darkness to steal the lives of those who become lost in mountains.

kanto_pokedex.name: Onix
kanto_pokedex.description: It burrows through the ground at a speed of 50 mph while feeding on large boulders.
kanto_pokedex.evolution: Evolves into Steelix via trade while holding a Metal Coat.

kanto_pokedex.name: Drowzee
kanto_pokedex.description: If your nose becomes itchy while you are sleeping, it's a sure sign that one of these Pokémon is standing above your pillow and trying to eat your dream through your nostrils.

kanto_pokedex.name: Hypno
kanto_pokedex.description: The swinging of its pendulum hypnotizes the foe. It is said that it once took a child away.

kanto_pokedex.name: Krabby
kanto_pokedex.description: It lives in burrows dug on sandy beaches. Its pincers fully grow back if they are torn off in battle.

kanto_pokedex.name: Kingler
kanto_pokedex.description: Its large pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, it is so heavy, it is difficult to aim.

kanto_pokedex.name: Voltorb
kanto_pokedex.description: It looks like a Poké Ball. It is dangerous because it may electrocute or explode on contact.

kanto_pokedex.name: Electrode
kanto_pokedex.description: It is known to drift on winds if it is bloated with stored electricity. It is rumored that they are created in factories.

kanto_pokedex.name: Exeggcute
kanto_pokedex.description: Even though it appears to be eggs of some sort, it was discovered to be a life-form more like plant seeds.
kanto_pokedex.evolution: Evolves into Exeggutor with a Leaf Stone.

kanto_pokedex.name: Exeggutor
kanto_pokedex.description: It is called 'The Walking Jungle.' If a head grows too big, it falls off and becomes an Exeggcute.

kanto_pokedex.name: Cubone
kanto_pokedex.description: It wears the skull of its deceased mother. Its cries echo inside the skull and come out as a sad melody.

kanto_pokedex.name: Marowak
kanto_pokedex.description: It is small and was originally weak. It has become adept at battling with bones.
